detail_desc: Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulder seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Short, jacquard-weave skirt with rows of fringing, elastication and a detachable tie at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Balaclava in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with sewn-on ears at the top. Jersey lining.
Shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Lace blouse with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a detachable belt in braided imitation suede.
Mesh trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Quilted, lightly padded jacket in a jacquard weave with a small stand-up collar, frog buttons down the front, chest pockets and slits in the sides. Lined.
Jersey-lined trousers in cotton twill with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, a zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and straight legs.
Cap in cotton twill with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Hat in a double layer of marled, cotton-blend jersey.
Underwired, lace bras with cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. High, smocked waist with a concealed drawstring and mesh side panels with a text print.
Vest top in cotton jersey.

Jumper in rib-knit cotton with a polo neck and long raglan sleeves. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight, knee-length legs.

Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets with a concealed hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets with a flap. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Chinos in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button. Skinny legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fully lined, one-shoulder bikini top with a knot at the front. No fasteners.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with short puff sleeves and a neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Longjohns in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Leather slides with a braided foot strap, leather insoles and rubber soles.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular elasticated, drawstring waist, mesh key pocket in the waistband and short slits at the hems.

Baby Exclusive. Top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and concealed press-studs at the top. Kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Flared dress in glittery tulle with a round, satin-trimmed, gathered neckline. Opening and button at the back of the neck and short, flounced sleeves. Underdress in a patterned weave.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short skater skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Short lace dress with a pleated skirt, short cap sleeves, a seam with ties at the waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a double-layered trim at the top, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and a chest pocket.
Cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with narrow ribbed cuffs and front pockets. No buttons.
Tube scarf knitted in soft cotton with ribbed trims and a small appliqué at the bottom.
Boxy-style hooded top in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless maxi dress in soft jersey with an open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Double-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Trainers with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Imitation suede slippers with soft pile linings and fluted soles.
Double-layered top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves with contrasting colour trims.
Trousers in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, back pockets, and wide, straight legs.
Short imitation suede skirt with a high paper bag waist.
Cropped, fitted top in jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Softshell trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, an adjustable, elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Reinforced at the back and knees and reinforced elastic straps under the feet. Brushed, thermal inside. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Blouse in an organic cotton weave with pleats and inset lace trims made from recycled polyester. Frill-trimmed, stand-up collar, wide 3/4-length sleeves, buttons at the back and a sewn-on tie belt at the hem that ties at the back.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.

Shoulder bag in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap and a wide, detachable plastic chain at the front. Flap with a concealed, magnetic press-stud and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Depth 6 cm, height 3.5 cm, width 21.5 cm.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Ski gloves in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with a print motif and reinforced palms. Elastication and a hook and loop tab at the wrists and soft inner ribbing at the top. Thinsulate™ lining.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, a round neckline and deep armholes.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
V-neck dress in ribbed jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a sewn-in wrapover and an asymmetric, raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with a flock print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jersey skirt with a draped, wrapover front and concealed elastication at the waist.
Long earrings in plastic and metal. Length 6.5 cm.
Pyjamas in satin with contrasting colour piping. Long-sleeved shirt with a resort collar and buttons down the front. Straight, wide bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Swimsuit in UV-protective material with a print motif at the top, small stand-up collar and a zip at the back. Short raglan sleeves and short legs. UPF50.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with decorative gathers around the neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam under the bust. Satin lining.
Set with earrings and ear cuffs in metal decorated with glass rhinestones. Four earrings in various designs and three ear cuffs. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounced trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.

Round bag in braided straw with an embroidered pattern on the front, narrow, imitation leather shoulder strap with a decorative tassel at one end and a tab with a magnetic press-stud at the top. Lined. Size 7x23.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fabric-covered Alice bands in various designs: one glittery, one patterned and one with a sewn-on bow.
Dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, long sleeves, tie belt at the waist and narrow ribbing around the front, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.

Set with a long-sleeved dress, a pair of leggings and a hairband. Dress in velour with a press-stud on one shoulder, a gathered seam at the top, heart-shaped front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Leggings and hairband in patterned jersey. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Hairband with a knot detail.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a foldover edge in faux fur at the top and a decorative grosgrain bow at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.

Double-breasted trenchcoat woven in a cotton blend. Notch lapels with a buttonhole, a loose yoke at the back and side pockets. Detachable belt at the waist, long sleeves with a tab and adjustable fastening at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Sleeveless jersey top with ties at the hem.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet and a calf-height shaft with reflective details. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a woven viscose blend with an elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist, narrow sides and a high cut at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short-sleeved sports top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
